oai_dc:dc.dc:description: These Proceedings report of empirical preliminary research, research made for Masterâ€˜s Theses, projects to implement organic school meals and school gardens as well as educational visions for the food education for sustainability for the future. Halfway of the iPOPY project, these Proceedings make visible some of the outcomes gained and work ahead towards more sustainable food systems.
